Package org.settings4j.helper.web

Class Summary
DefaultPropertiesLoader Implementation which loads Default Properties from web.xml Init-Paramters and adds a Property connector to Settings4j.
DefaultPropertiesLoaderListener ServletContextListener to initialize the DefaultPropertiesLoader.
Log4jConfigurationLoader With this Implementation you can define a Key in your web.xml (init-parameter "settings4jLog4jConfigurationKey") with that you can configure your Path to your log4j.xml.
Log4jConfigurationLoaderListener ServletContextListener to initialize the Log4jConfigurationLoader.
